name: MazeMaker
description:
Controls:

  • R = Restart
  • Return = Start AI
  • Left Click = Build
  • Right Click = Destroy
  • Middle Click = Destroy all
  • W, A, S, D = Camera movement
  • Mouse Wheel = Choose build block
  • Mouse Whell + leftShift = Zoom
  • P = Pause / Play
  • Ecape = Menu
  • Q = Rotate
  • E = Block Menu
  • N = Hide/Show Numbers

In Menu:

  • On/Off Button = Quit
  • Zoom Button = Fullscreen Switch
